messages.messageBody:
The webmaster, SEKIGUTI, of
http://g1342122.at.infoseek.co.jp/hyousi.htm
the one which discusses the mystery woman in the Shinsengumi and the
popular Love chart replied to one of my posts.

If anyone who knows Japanese wants to read the webmaster's comments
visit http://pa.orange-e.net/?id=g1342122 (you should find my post
easily). It is actually my 2nd post...I couldn't understand his
first reply...I'm not sure if I offended him with my
Japanese/babelfish or not LOL

babelfish says:
"It is sekiguti of the Mibu Â˜Q loyal retainer new selection group
curator. It probably is to be possible with desire of the mail
magazine? When that it is, rejoicing, you send. You know the fact
that the foreign country the reader comes very in honor. Because
this one English that much is not proud, details (the reply with
unskillful English) at the mail we would like to give. Then, also in
the future we ask may."

basically, the site offers some kind of email newsletter, I ~think~
and he said to sign up for it...and I did...

(sigh) this is the like the 2nd person to complain about their poor
English and I'm trying to communicate in Japanese Babelfish LOL...

I'm going to post a list of the most active Japanese Shinsengumi
Messageboards (BBS is the term they prefer to use) at
http://www.shinsengumimb.com so we can eavesdrop on *their*
conversations...some posts are -exactly- like ours...weird...it
could be that the demographics of the posters parallell ours that is
overwhelmingly female :)

I actually tried to submit the messageboard to a Bakumatsu Japanese
webring and it keeps returning error messages saying that the
webaddress http://www.shinsengumimb.com is invalid...anyways if we
ever get on that ring then we are set because all of the major
Shinsengumi sites are on it. I even tried submitting the original
ezboard address. :(
